content: That's really helpful. I think I'll go with a 10x10 inch album with a simple, classic design. I want the album to be a timeless piece that they can treasure for years to come. For the leather, I'm thinking of a high-quality, black leather with a subtle texture. And for the embossing, I'll choose a simple, silver font with their names on the cover. Do you think that sounds like a good combination?
